KnightUpgradePage

"Killing a level-3 or higher monster is quite difficult unless you have good dragon research and equipment. 

First you need to upgrade your dragon, make sure you have atleast 7/10 points in each dragon combat research to hit a lvl-3+ with good damage and forge some dragon combat accessories if you have chuthlu's/Eater Bunny items,wear them whenever you hit a monster 

" "After this Lets see how we can kill a monster quickly:

" "In order to kill a monster quickly people make mistakes like doing max attack every time,dont hit max attack button just boost the alliance bonus by doing single hits

" "Team up to kill a lvl-3+ mob with 3 players and do all single attacks that will boost the allinace bonus and get you mob killed quickly 

TIP: Use your farm accounts to kill monsters with your team mates ask them to use thier farm accounts if each player got 1 farm account so he can use 2 dragons(farm and main), 3 players can have 6 dragons to attack a monster that will be really helpful."

"When you kill a monster your not sure that it will turn into an elite or not, So as far i have researched elite monsters are spawn in same location everytime, so whenever a monsters turn into elite one just BookMark that location so if u find any other mob in that location after sometime there is a 60-70% possibilty you will get an elite again :)

"Everyone loves to get challenger rewards specially when you working in a team to kill a monster but BOB made it totally random. It doesn't depends on anything like no of hits/first hit/last hit it allocate the challenger name randomly,you can get good challenger rewards if you kill higher lvl monster."

"To make a farm account you just have to click on the accounts->switch account->start new game 

 After starting new game just complete the tutorial and use supreme teleport to get into your main kingdom, remember you can only use supreme teleport before cc-5 so dont upgrade much before teleporting to your kingdom 
 Lets see how we can create a good resource producing farms."

Gems are the core resource of any war game this is the main revenue generator for developers thats why they release packs so they can buy it with real money and upgrade faster,but if you dont wanna spend any money then here are some tips to make gems daily.

"Food Farm is easy to create and will get you lot of food that you dont have to gather any, to make your farm a good food producer just follow below steps: 

 1. Upgrade cc to 10 atleast preferably till cc-15 is best so you can kill lvl-3 monster as well. 
 2. Construct 21 food farms and upgrade it to max. 
 3. Research food production 
 4. Set Lord skills on food production. 
 5. Upgrade dragon and forge some good accessories for food production 
 6. Assign Knight on resource production 
 7. Activate VIP to get resource production boost"
You can make farms accounts for wood/stone/iron as well just follow the same step given for food farm the only problem is that you cant get any dragon accessory boost for these resources.

1. HIT MONSTERS:\nYou get gifts if you attack a monster, gift level depends on the monster level means level-4 monster will drop higher level gifts than level-3 monster, you also get gems by hitting monsters.\nELITE MONSTERS HAVE HIGHER CHANCE TO DROP GEMS.

2. GATHER LAIRS:
Gather as many lairs as you can per day to make more gems,make a team to kill level-3 and higher monster dont kill it solo
Reset dragon skills on gatherings so you can gather quickly

 Lvl-1 Lair gives 50 gems
 Lvl-2 Lair gives 100 gems
 Lvl-3 Lair gives 300 gems
 Lvl-4 Lair gives 900 gems
 Lvl-5 Lair gives 1500 gems
 Lvl-6 Lair gives 3000 gems
You can upgrade your dragon by doing research and using dragon xp there is one more way to make your dragon stronger is to forge some equipments

Dont forget to collect alliance gifts whenever you kill a monster you get a alliance gift, you can get gems from these gifts as well.\nComplete alliance missions to get gold alliance gifts sometimes it gives 300-400 gems
Eater bunny equipments are good for dragon boost forge these equipments listed below

"You dont need any specific account for gold prodution. Yes thats the advantage of it, if you create above mentioned farms then all you need to do is construct houses for gold production, research gold production and can even forge some gold production dragon equipments you will get gold from all your farm accounts."
Cthulhu Equipemets are also good for dragon booost listed below

After creating farm accounts you have to create a bank or use one of the farm account to be a bank because your farm accounts have some production capacity after its full they will stop producing so you have to regularly transfer rss to your bank so that your farm account can start producing again :)\nYou also need most gems in your farm so you can keep it safe from attackers so make sure you have some troops in your farm account to you can gather lairs for gems
You can get level-6 tiles only on desert so port at the edge of the desert so that you can take shield and start gathering tiles to get maximum resources.

You can build gem palace if your civil center is level-9 or up.\nDIG GEMS FOR 1 DAY, yes guys dont go with 3 days/6 days/12 days Calculation has been done you will get 450 gems per day and that is max you can get.

"Resources are the most important part of any war game, To get resources you can either attack someone and loot rss or you can gather tiles/lairs, HIGHER LEVEL TILES CAN BE GATHER FASTER COMPARE TO THE LOWER LVL ONES to gather more faster 
1. Buy and use Gather Boost from alliance store
2. Set dragon skills on gatherings and research gathering boost
Tip: Just create some farm accounts if you want regular rss supply "

You can get speedups and gems if u participate in diffrent events. 
Events are of two type
1. Individual event
2. Alliance Events

Whatever the event is there is always 3 goals to be achieved which gives speedups, gems and gifts other then they give THEME REWARDS based on the rank you get.
Just focus on getting goal-3 first if you are unable to reach to the goal-3 ask some points from you allies.

Tip: If you have some farm/alt accounts then make some points from those accounts and donate it to your main account :)

"Follow the above video to upgrade knight :)

Knights are the most important soldiers they can help you to boost growth, attacking and defending skills, use knight wisely to grow your city like if you wanna do any build then set knight to Engineer, for research set it to Magician. 
 We can use knight to any specific position we want, so just lvl-up your knight and assign it wisely.
"

"Follow the above video to open chest automatically :)\n\nIts easy to open any type of chest using this method it just required a laptop and decent internet connection.
"
1.BlueStack/Memo Emulator : which is used to run android app on laptop.\n2.MouseRecorder: Which is used to record the pattern.
1.You can even use this trick on speedups like you dont have to press while using 30m or 1h or any speedups.\n\n2.Use it to transfer rss from one account to another.

1. Get atleast 3 knights to max level so you can assign two of them on Commander and Engineer for Attacking/Defending and one will go with march.\n 2. While attacking use your max lvl knight on commander and send other max knight with attacking march.\n 3. Get your NobalHall to 20 to get extra 20% knight boost.

There is a smart trick if you wanna make gems in kill event\nJust use your farm account and train some t3 siege troops, Attack that farm with your main account, heal your farm and repeat untill you get goal-3 or keep on doing it untill you get theme rank-1 reward or a good one :)

You can make lot of gems in monster hunting event as follows.
1.Keep on collecting dragon energy cards by training 800 t3 so when monster hunt event arrives you can have enough dragon energy.
2. Kill only lvl-1,2 monsters with max-hit to get more gifts in less energy.
3. Use all of your accounts(farms+main) and keep on hitting monsters as soon as dragon energy refills.
4.Reset monster skills focus on critical/combo hit.
Always buy construction chest of 4500 gems for any build/research/training.If you use your gems directly for instant finish it will cost you more.

You can complete solo and inferno goals to get rewards and gems, below are the tricks to complete lord trial missions. 

1. Train 800 t3 troops per hour to get 2X 1000 dragon energy by completing solo event goal-1

2. Use shatter wave to deconstruct a building and then reconstruct it, repeat these steps to complete solo, inferno goals(not recommended)

Mystery Gifts are again can get you gems just check bottom right on your game screen it refresh in some time interval.\nTip: As I have noticed mystery box give you SAME GIFT ON PARTICULAR TIME so keep an eye on it.
Complete alliance missions daily to get bronze,silver and gold chest which can get you gems and various rewards, just ask your ally members to train some batches of troops daily

"Material is the metaphor.

"
"A material metaphor is the unifying theory of a rationalized space and a system of motion." "The material is grounded in tactile reality, inspired by the study of paper and ink, yet " "technologically advanced and open to imagination and magic.
" "Surfaces and edges of the material provide visual cues that are grounded in reality. The " "use of familiar tactile attributes helps users quickly understand affordances. Yet the " "flexibility of the material creates new affordances that supercede those in the physical " "world, without breaking the rules of physics.
" "The fundamentals of light, surface, and movement are key to conveying how objects move, " "interact, and exist in space and in relation to each other. Realistic lighting shows " "seams, divides space, and indicates moving parts.

"
"Bold, graphic, intentional.

"
"The foundational elements of print based design typography, grids, space, scale, color, " "and use of imagery guide visual treatments. These elements do far more than please the " "eye. They create hierarchy, meaning, and focus. Deliberate color choices, edge to edge " "imagery, large scale typography, and intentional white space create a bold and graphic " "interface that immerse the user in the experience.
" "An emphasis on user actions makes core functionality immediately apparent and provides " "waypoints for the user.

"
"Motion provides meaning.

"
"Motion respects and reinforces the user as the prime mover. Primary user actions are " "inflection points that initiate motion, transforming the whole design.
" "All action takes place in a single environment. Objects are presented to the user without " "breaking the continuity of experience even as they transform and reorganize.
" "Motion is meaningful and appropriate, serving to focus attention and maintain continuity. " "Feedback is subtle yet clear. Transitions are efﬁcient yet coherent.

"
"3D world.

"
"The material environment is a 3D space, which means all objects have x, y, and z " "dimensions. The z-axis is perpendicularly aligned to the plane of the display, with the " "positive z-axis extending towards the viewer. Every sheet of material occupies a single " "position along the z-axis and has a standard 1dp thickness.
" "On the web, the z-axis is used for layering and not for perspective. The 3D world is " "emulated by manipulating the y-axis.

"
"Light and shadow.

"
"Within the material environment, virtual lights illuminate the scene. Key lights create " "directional shadows, while ambient light creates soft shadows from all angles.
" "Shadows in the material environment are cast by these two light sources. In Android " "development, shadows occur when light sources are blocked by sheets of material at " "various positions along the z-axis. On the web, shadows are depicted by manipulating the " "y-axis only. The following example shows the card with a height of 6dp.

"
"Resting elevation.

"
"All material objects, regardless of size, have a resting elevation, or default elevation " "that does not change. If an object changes elevation, it should return to its resting " "elevation as soon as possible.

"
"Component elevations.

"
"The resting elevation for a component type is consistent across apps (e.g., FAB elevation " "does not vary from 6dp in one app to 16dp in another app).
" "Components may have different resting elevations across platforms, depending on the depth " "of the environment (e.g., TV has a greater depth than mobile or desktop).

"
"Responsive elevation and dynamic elevation offsets.

"
"Some component types have responsive elevation, meaning they change elevation in response " "to user input (e.g., normal, focused, and pressed) or system events. These elevation " "changes are consistently implemented using dynamic elevation offsets.
" "Dynamic elevation offsets are the goal elevation that a component moves towards, relative " "to the component’s resting state. They ensure that elevation changes are consistent " "across actions and component types. For example, all components that lift on press have " "the same elevation change relative to their resting elevation.
" "Once the input event is completed or cancelled, the component will return to its resting " "elevation.

"
"Avoiding elevation interference.

"
"Components with responsive elevations may encounter other components as they move between " "their resting elevations and dynamic elevation offsets. Because material cannot pass " "through other material, components avoid interfering with one another any number of ways, " "whether on a per component basis or using the entire app layout.
" "On a component level, components can move or be removed before they cause interference. " "For example, a floating action button (FAB) can disappear or move off screen before a " "user picks up a card, or it can move if a snackbar appears.
" "On the layout level, design your app layout to minimize opportunities for interference. " "For example, position the FAB to one side of stream of a cards so the FAB won’t interfere " "when a user tries to pick up one of cards.

"

You can either attack solo or do a rally with clan-mates, things to need to do before attacking any city
1.Scout first to get the info of troops/traps/knight of defending city for better scout result make sure your scout research is 8/10
2.If you are strong enough to take the smaller city and you dont wanna let defender alert or bubble by scouting then do the quick attack by teleporting next to him
3.Before attacking any decent upgraded city just prepare the attack first check attack preparation tip for that.
KnightDetailScreen
KnightScreen
DragonScreen
AttackingTricksScreen

Inorder to perform a rally, a rally leader should have good attacking city means thier research/skills/dragon accessories/knight all set on attack Two type of rally we can do \n1. One-hit Rally \n2.Multi-Hit Rally
If you wanna hit opponent only single time than its better the rally leader gets all the reinforcements and teleport near enemy in the last few secs

For multi-hit rally, all the rally participents need to teleport near opponent so the rally leader start rally again and to protect from opponent clan-mates they need to use their extra marches to set camps to cover all space so that no one can teleport in that particular area.
DefendingTricks
Defense is the best offence, Its easy to defend then to attack
BOBVideos
kvk

Counter rally is like when your under attacked by a rally then how to counter it and set rally to your attacker \n When your under attacked by someone you just need to port somewhere far away and take a 2h bubble in last secs, by this the attacker troops will have to go through with the long march so while attacker troops are returning you can teleport there with your rally mates and start a rally on him , he cant bubble because his march is still out.

To make your city as trap city first to need to have following things
1.Max Embassy: so you can have max reinforcements recommended to have t4s reinforced
2.Max Armory:Build max lvl traps
3.Wear Max Trap/defense Dragon accessories
4.Troops count equal to hospital capacity so the troop lost is zero
5.Lord/Dragon Skills on Traps/Defense
6.Max Defensive Research(Traps+troop defense+troop life)
7.Max Knight Lvl assigned as Engineer and commander
8.Max VIP level and activated while defending

Dont worry if you dont have these at max level but that is recommended to make a greatest ever trap city
If you have the above things ready then your ready just lure your enemy to attack you, they will lose more troops everytime they attack and you just need to heal your troops/traps nothing else thats it no more building/training.

This is the best ratio if you want to play defensive although you can have more troop and you can set extra troops to camp, but if you dont wanna do this just follow this you will be getting more kill forces without even attacking killing :)

To perform this first you need to learn how to lure enemy so to lure them just do 1 troop attack without using your dragon else your dragon will get captured, just be unshielded and teleport next to your enemy will make your opponent furious and he may attack you,keep on scouting you enemy will also make him attack you after making your opponent attack you now its time to defend.

Because you have exact same troops as your hospitals so dont worry you wont lose any
 After getting hit or if your hospitals are full just take 2h bubble(so you can get rss supply easily)and start healing when you done healing its time to repeat what you have done :) Just remember always have a bubbled bank with you which can provide rss when you need it to heal

To perform solo attack you need to know about march capacity, the max march capacity anyone can have without boost is 300k with max boost(50% march boost) is 450k so while attacking keep in mind you can only attack with max 450k troops so while attacking with t3 troops if you wanna win that attack then to be on safe side just attack only those opponents who got troops half of your march capacity dont attack who got more troops than your march size, its depends on the research,dragon equipments,lord/dragon skills. you can check it in bonus comparision which is available in the reports

As you can see the red arrow shows your bonus is less than your enemy so work on that make it better than your opponent and you will win that.\n While performing an attack with t4s you can kill anyone having t3s easily below are some reports

MeatShield is very important if you wanna secure your higher lvl troops means if you have t3s than train some t1 troops as a meatshield while attacking someone and if you have t4s than use t3 as meat shield to be very precise suppose your march capacity is 300k and you have t3 troops, To attack someone then use 15-20k t1 troops rest t3s the benefit is only your t1 troops get killed and your t3 will get saved

To perform a good attack you need to prepare for it first, dont rush and send marches in hurry.

1.Use march boost to increase the size of army you can send at a time 
2.You need to have atleast two high lvl knight, assign one in commander and send one with your march to attack
3.Use Attack Boost
4.Reset Lord/Dragon skills on troops attack
5.You should have good troop life research
6.Dont forget to wear best attacking dragon equipments.
7.Make sure your VIP is active
Gem Drive
Build Time Calculator
This is a report of defending,Attacker used t4s to hit a me while i am having more than 2M troops
As you can see he used t3 troops as meatshield so his t3 troops died and t4 survived
Lord/Dragon LevelUp Quickly

Lord can be level up by construction,research and lord xp items besides this you can increase your lord level by following a simple trick
1. Buy lord boost from alliance store but do not use it wait for it
2. Whenever you complete a build or research you get some quest rewards to collect...DO NOT COLLECT IT SAVE IT
3. Save quest rewards untill you have atleast 50+, then activate lord skill boost and start collecting quest rewards for every reward you collect you get extra 25% lord xp

You can level up your dragon by hitting monsters, dragon research and using dragon xp items here is the tip to how you should use dragon xp boost
1. First you need to have lot of dragon energy items you can get them by train 800 t3 per hour
2. Wait for the monster kill event to use them.
3. In monster hunt event just activate dragon xp boost and use all your dragon items to hit as many monster as you can.

 Great dragon keep 20 gives 50% xp boost + you can also get addition dragon xp boost if you forge some chthulu and eater bunny items
